patthana19.12:4.1: Naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.12:5.1: Hetuyā dvāvīsa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa … pe … aññamaññe soḷasa … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … avigate dvāvīsa.
patthana19.12:6.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.12:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe terasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana19.12:8.1: Nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.12:9.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.12:10.1: Namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.12:11.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.12:12.1: Namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
